content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when trying to use a burner mining drill without fuel
- Make sure to fuel the burner mining drill before using it
### Errors when trying to use a furnace without ingredients
- Make sure to provide the furnace with the necessary ingredients before using it
### Errors when trying to use a steam engine without input liquid
- Make sure to provide the steam engine with the necessary input liquid before using it
### Errors when trying to use a boiler without fuel
- Make sure to fuel the boiler before using it
### Errors when trying to use a pipe without fluid
- Make sure to provide the pipe with the necessary fluid before using it
